description:
King Eau De Parfum - A Regal Masculine Fragrance

Experience the majestic power of King Eau De Parfum, a luxurious 100ml fragrance crafted for the modern monarch. This Arabic perfume embodies strength, sophistication, and uncompromising masculinity with its rich blend of premium ingredients. ðŸ’Ž

The Essence of Royal Masculine Fragrance

King EDP opens with an invigorating burst of citrus and spices that command attention, before revealing a complex heart that balances aromatic woods with subtle floral notes. The remarkable longevity ensures your presence is felt long after you've left the room. This oud-infused masterpiece is perfect for the man who demands nothing but excellence. âœ¨

Product Information
Size 100ml
Gender Men
Product Type Eau De Parfum
Concentration Eau De Parfum (EDP)
Brand King

Fragrance Profile of King Eau De Parfum

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Bergamot, Black Pepper, Saffron
Heart Notes Cedarwood, Rose, Jasmine
Base Notes Amber, Oud, Vanilla, Musk

Key Features of King Eau De Parfum

  • ðŸ”¥ Exceptional longevity (8+ hours)
  • ðŸŒ¿ Premium natural ingredients
  • ðŸ’« Moderate to strong sillage
  • âœ¨ Elegant glass bottle with royal design elements
  • ðŸ’Ž Suitable for evening wear and special occasions

The King fragrance collection draws inspiration from ancient royal traditions, where monarchs wore distinctive scents as symbols of their power and status. This best-selling masculine fragrance combines traditional Middle Eastern perfumery with contemporary sophistication, resulting in a scent that's both timeless and modern.

If you appreciate the royal character of King EDP, you might also enjoy Damou Al Dahab EDP, another exceptional fragrance in our luxury collection.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does King Eau De Parfum last on skin?
King Eau De Parfum offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. The premium masculine fragrance contains high-quality concentrated oils that bond with your skin's natural chemistry. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points after showering when skin is still slightly damp, and layer with unscented lotion to create a base that helps the fragrance adhere better to your skin. ðŸ”¥
